channel.title: Another Blog
channel.description: One or more sentences introducing this blog.

item.title: Archery 部署
item.description:
Archery 部署

系统版本

Centos 6.5 python 3.6 pip 3.6 Archery 1.4.5 Mysql 5.6 （用 Percona server 56 代替） mongodb 4.0 Redis 5.0.3

所有部署均在一台机器上进行，部署过程中不再说明

安装python3.6

wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/3.6.0/Python-3.6.0.tgz
cd Python-3.6.0
./configure
make && make install

安装pip3.6

curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py -o get-pip.py（或者浏览器直接访问 https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py 将内容保存为 get-pip.py）
python3.4 get-pip.py

安装 virtualenv

pip3.6 install virtualenv -i https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/pypi/web/simple/

创建 python 虚拟环境

virtualenv venv4archery --python=python3.6

切换 python 运行环境到虚拟环境

source venv4archery/bin/activate

安装系统依赖

source venv4archery/bin/activate
yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ mysql-devel openldap-devel unixODBC-devel gettext

安装Mysql 5.6

注意

（ 我在安装SQLAdvisor时，用Percona Server 替换了 Mysql5.6）
建议安装 Percona Server 作为数据库，在下边 SQLAdvisor 编译时，需要依赖Percona内的 libperconaserverclient_r.so
安装 repo
wget https://repo.mysql.com/yum/mysql-5.6-community/el/6/x86_64/mysql-community-release-el6-5.noarch.rpm
yum install -y yum-utils.noarch
yum-config-manager --enable mysql56-community 
yum install -y mysql-community-server.x86_64

下载 Archery 1.4.5

https://github.com/hhyo/Archery/tree/v1.4.5

安装 Archery

安装依赖
cd Archery-1.4.5
pip3.6 install -r requirements.txt -i https://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/pypi/web/simple/

数据库初始化

创建数据库
create database archery charset=utf8;
初始化库
source venv4archery/bin/activate
cd Archery-1.4.5
python3.6 manage.py makemigrations sql
python3.6 manage.py migrate

编译翻译文件

python3.6 manage.py compilemessages

创建管理用户

python3.6 manage.py createsuperuser

安装mongodb4.0

创建 /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb.repo
[mongodb-org-4.0]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=http://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/4.0/x86_64/
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1
gpgkey=http://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-4.0.asc
安装mongo
yum install mongodb-org
创建 mongodb 用户和角色
mongo #进入mongo
use admin
db.createRole( { role: "executeFunctions", privileges: [ { resource: { anyResource: true }, actions: [ "anyAction" ] } ], roles: [] } )  #创建角色
use themis
db.createUser({user: "dbuser",pwd: "dbuser",roles:[ { role: "executeFunctions", db: "admin" } ]}) #创建用户
安装 Redis-5.0.3
wget http://download.redis.io/releases/redis-5.0.3.tar.gz
cd redis-5.0.3
make install
cd utils
./install_server.sh
启动Redis
/etc/init.d/redis_6379 start

启动 Archery

runserver启动
source venv4archery/bin/activate
python3.6 manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:9123  --insecure
Gunicorn+Nginx启动
nginx配置示例
server{
        listen 9123; # 监听的端口
        server_name archery;
        client_max_body_size 20M; # 处理Request Entity Too Large
        proxy_read_timeout 600s;  # 超时时间与Gunicorn超时时间设置一致，主要用于在线查询

        location / {
          proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:8888;
          proxy_set_header Host $host:9123; # 解决重定向404的问题，和listen端口保持一致，如果是docker则和宿主机映射端口保持一致
          proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
        }

        location /static {
          alias /opt/archery/static; # 此处指向settings.py配置项STATIC_ROOT目录的绝对路径，用于nginx收集静态资源
        }

        error_page 404 /404.html;
            location = /40x.html {
        }

        error_page 500 502 503 504 /50x.html;
            location = /50x.html {
        }
    }
启动
source venv4archery/bin/activate
bash startup.sh

Inception 部署

源码下载地址

https://github.com/jonn-yan/inception
安装编译环境
yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ automake autoconf libtool make
执行安装
cd inception-master
sh nception_build.sh debug #debug 为编译创建的目录
新增配置文件

vim debug/inc.cnf

[inception]
general_log=1
general_log_file=inception.log
port=6669
socket=/tmp/inc.socket
character-set-client-handshake=0
character-set-server=utf8
inception_remote_system_password=
inception_remote_system_user=root
inception_remote_backup_port=3307
inception_remote_backup_host=127.0.0.1
inception_support_charset=utf8,utf8mb4
inception_osc_on=ON
inception_osc_bin_dir=/usr/bin
运行 Inception
cd inception-master
./debug/mysql/bin/Inception --defaults-file=./debug/inc.cnf
配置 Archery 中的 Inception

系统配置 》配置项管理》选择操作（系统设置） 配置完成后即可进行SQL上线中的“SQL检测”，但会弹出报错窗口，报错如下：

报错处理

Must start as begin statement* 或者 TypeError: ‘<’ not supported between instances of ‘NoneType’ and ‘int’Inception版本不正确导致 参考：https://github.com/hhyo/archery/wiki/faq#%E5%85%B6%E4%BB%96 可以按照下列方法修改，或者直接使用推荐版本或修改 venv4archer/lib/python3.6/site-packages/MySQLdb/connections.py

def show_warnings(self):
"""Return detailed information about warnings as a
sequence of tuples of (Level, Code, Message). This
is only supported in MySQL-4.1 and up. If your server
is an earlier version, an empty sequence is returned."""
if self._server_version[0] is None: return () #增加一行，解决语法SQL语法错误时弹出的报错信息
if self._server_version < (4,1): return ()
self.query("SHOW WARNINGS")
r = self.store_result()
warnings = r.fetch_row(0)
return warnings

SQLAdvisor-2.0 部署

下载地址

https://github.com/jonn-yan/SQLAdvisor

安装依赖

yum install install cmake libaio-devel libffi-devel glib2 glib2-devel

安装percona 依赖

（需要卸载原安装的Mysql5.6，否则安装会提示冲突）

SQLAdvisor 编译需要
参考

https://github.com/Meituan-Dianping/SQLAdvisor/commit/2a7a3d879c42abf22202500b63dc74805064d116

wget http://www.percona.com/downloads/percona-release/redhat/0.1-3/percona-release-0.1-3.noarch.rpm
yum localinstall -y percona-release-0.1-3.noarch.rpm
yum install -y Percona-Server-server-56.x86_64
建立软链
ln -s /usr/lib64/libperconaserverclient_r.so.18 /usr/lib64/libperconaserverclient_r.so
编译依赖项sqlparser
cd SQLAdvisor-2.0
cmake -DBUILD_CONFIG=mysql_release -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=debug -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr/local/sqlparser ./
make && make install
编译 SQLAdvisor

在编译目录下生成 sqladvisor 可执行文件

cd SQLAdvisor-2.0/sqladvisor
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=debug ./
make

在 Archery 中配置 SQLadvisor 路径

系统配置 》配置项管理》选择操作（系统设置）中的SQL优化部分

Soar 部署

下载二进制包

wget https://github.com/XiaoMi/soar/releases/download/0.11.0/soar.linux-amd64 -O soar chmod a+x soar

配置 Archery 中 Soar 配置

系统配置 》配置项管理》选择操作（系统设置）中的SQL优化部分 其中 SOAR_TEST_DSN 为测试用的数据库 至此关键部署已经完成

其它 Archery 详细配置请参考 https://github.com/hhyo/Archery/wiki

版权声明

本文作者： JonnYan
本文链接： https://jonn-yan.github.io/blog/archivers/2019-04-15-archery-1
版权声明： 本博客所有文章除特别声明外，均采用 CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 许可协议。转载请注明出处！

item.title: Rabbitmq 单节点部署笔记
item.description:
Rabbitmq 单节点部署笔记

环境说明
系统：Centos 6.5
erlang：>= 19.3
RabbitMQ：3.7.13
Rabbit官网地址
https://www.rabbitmq.com/
Erlang官方地址
http://www.erlang.org/

配置 YUM 源

Erlang repo

/etc/yum.repos.d/rabbitmq-erlang.repo

[rabbitmq-erlang]
name=rabbitmq-erlang
baseurl=http://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/rpm/erlang/20/el/6
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enable=1
Rabbitmq repo

/etc/yum.repos.d/rabbitmq.repo

[bintray-rabbitmq-server]
name=bintray-rabbitmq-rpm
baseurl=http://dl.bintray.com/rabbitmq/rpm/rabbitmq-server/v3.7.x/el/6/
gpgcheck=0
repo_gpgcheck=0
enabled=1

验证 YUM 源并执行安装

验证 Erlang

yum list | grep erlang

安装 Erlang

yum install -y erlang.x86_64

验证 Rabbitmq

yum list | grep rabbitmq

安装Rabbitmq

yum install -y rabbitmq-server.noarch

启动与登陆

启动MQ

/etc/init.d/rabbitmq-server start

启动管理插件

rabbitmq-plugins enable rabbitmq_management rabbitmq_web_stomp rabbitmq_stomp

其中web_stomp和stomp插件官网介绍如下（推荐开启）：

rabbitmq_web_stomp
https://www.rabbitmq.com/web-stomp.html
rabbitmq_stomp
https://www.rabbitmq.com/stomp.html

登陆MQ

开启管理插件后，会看到有 15672 端口被监听

netstat -tunlp 查看端口

访问 15672 端口

http://10.100.24.51:15672/#/users

使用默认用户： guest（密码：guest）登陆

报错 User can only log in via localhost 

这个报错是因为新版本对 guest 用户做了限制，只允许从localhost（即服务器本地登陆），官方解释：https://www.rabbitmq.com/access-control.html

可以通过修改配置文件开启远程访问

也可通过新增管理用户的方式，修改登陆用户
rabbitmqctl add_user admin admin
rabbitmqctl set_user_tags admin administrator
rabbitmqctl set_permissions -p / admin '.*' '.*' '.*'

版权声明

本文作者： JonnYan
本文链接： https://jonn-yan.github.io/blog/archivers/2019-03-29-rabbitmq-1
版权声明： 本博客所有文章除特别声明外，均采用 CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 许可协议。转载请注明出处！

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll and EasyBook
item.description:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

GitHub Flavored Markdown is supported.

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

And is supported!

Use $$ to wrap your formulas. For example, $$ e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0 $$ displays

Multi-line forumlas are supported too.

EasyBook Advanced Functions

You are using EasyBook the template from laobubu.net. Therefore some features are supported now:

  • Pagination is enabled.
  • Disqus or 多说 is ready.
  • TOC for posts is enabled.
  • Profile including your links and avatar on the sidebar.
  • And more…

Tips: You can disable Disqus or 多说 on posts/pages by adding nocomments: true into YAML Front Matter.

EasyBook uses upaiyun CDN to make everyone lncluding Chinese visitors feel speedy. You can find it in _includes/footer.html and change it to your favorite CDN like Google CDN.

Support me by…

Add a link

EasyBook does not make the footer heavy; the link to theme could be on about.md:

This website is using laobubu’s theme: EasyBook

Donate (PayPal or 支付宝)

That’s the best :smile:

Please visit http://laobubu.net/donate.html

Star and Fork on GitHub (free)

Not going to donate? That’s okay. You can also send out your precious star on GitHub.

And Here We Go

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll’s dedicated Help repository.
